save it as xcf, load next time
just keep in mind, that those values are masks too
subtract the mask from 777 to get the permissions
you want to have directory permission 755, then you have to use dmask=022     (777-022=755)
you want to have file permission 664, then you have to use fmask=002     (666-002=664)
